name: 陳斌豪
objective:
先修課程：物理或負責教授同意
不可壓縮流體，質量不滅，非黏性流體之運動，柏努力定律，線性及角動量定理及其應用，渦流與勢流，黏性流，納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及其應用，管中壓力頭損失及增加，邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
Fundamental Concepts, Fluid Statics, Basic Equations in Integral Form for a Control Volume, Introduction to Differential Analysis of Fluid Motion, Incompressibility in Viscid Flow, Dimensional Analysis , Internal in Compressible Viscous Flow, External Incompressible Flow. Introduction
to Compressible Flow.
schedule:
LEC 1 Introduction Velocity Field
LEC 2Velocity and Acceleration Fields Revisited
LEC 3 Inviscid Flow ＆Uniform Flow
LEC 4 Other Aspects of Potential Flow Analysis
LEC 5 Steady Laminar Flow Between Fixed Parallel plates
LEC 6 DimensionlessGroups in Fluid MechanicsGroups Mechanics
LEC 7 Flow Around Immersed Bodies
LEC 8 From F=ma Applied Directly to a Fluid Element
LEC 9 Turbulent shear stress
LEC 10 Chapter 9 Introduction
LEC 11 Prandtl/BlasiusBoundary Layer Solution
LEC 12 Pressure Drag
LEC 13 Surface Pressure Distribution
LEC 14 Category of compressible flow
LEC 15 Converging–Diverging Duct Flow
LEC 16 Adiabatic constant area duct flow with friction (Fannoflow)
scorePolicy:
作業 10%
出席 20%
期中考 30%
期末考 40%
materials: Fox and McDonald's Introduction to Fluid Mechanics/Philip J. Pritchard and John W. Mitchell, Wiley.
consultation: office hours 綜合科學館 526-16 室
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG6：潔淨水與衛生（Clean Water and Sanitation）SDG13：氣候行動（Climate Action）
